SELECT ATTENDANCE_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO ATTENDANCE_T ( ATT_NO, ATT_IN_TIME, ATT_OUT_TIME, ATT_WORK_TIME, CREATE_DT, CREATOR, MODIFY_DT, MODIFIER, EMP_NO ) VALUES ( #{attNo}, #{attInTime}, #{attOutTime}, #{attWorkTime}, #{createDt}, #{creator}, CURRENT_DATE, #{modifier}, #{empNo} )
mapper.select: SELECT N.ANN_CT_NO, A.ATT_IN_TIME, A.ATT_OUT_TIME, A.ATT_WORK_TIME, A.CREATE_DT FROM ATTENDANCE_T A INNER JOIN ANNUAL_T N ON A.EMP_NO = N.EMP_NO WHERE EXTRACT(MONTH FROM A.CREATE_DT) = #{month} AND TRUNC(A.CREATE_DT) = TRUNC(TO_DATE(SUBSTR(N.ANN_START_TIME, 1, 10), 'YYYY-MM-DD')) GROUP BY N.ANN_CT_NO, A.ATT_IN_TIME, A.ATT_OUT_TIME, A.ATT_WORK_TIME, A.CREATE_DT ORDER BY A.CREATE_DT ASC, A.ATT_IN_TIME ASC
